title: Set Credentials
content:
git config user.name "judigot"
git config user.email "judigot@gmail.com"
git config --global user.name "judigot"
git config --global user.email "judigot@github.com"

title: Upload Project Folder Files/Override Repository
content:
git init
git add .
git commit -m "Commit"
git remote add origin https://github.com/judigot/(?)
git remote -v
git push -f origin master
git status

title: Download Files/Repository
content:
git init
git remote add origin https://github.com/judigot/(?)
git pull origin master
git status

title: Save Changes
content:
git add .
git commit -m "Commit"
git push -f origin master
git status

title: Delete All Files
content:
git init
git remote add origin https://github.com/judigot/(?)
git pull origin master
git rm -r *
git commit -m "Delete"
git push -f origin master
git status

title: Delete Individual Files
content:
git init
git remote add origin https://github.com/judigot/(?)
git pull origin master
git rm file.txt
git commit -m "Delete"
git push -f origin master
git status
